name: topojson
description: An extension to GeoJSON that encodes topology.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n topojson -o dist/topojson.js -- client.js && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n topojson -o dist/topojson-server.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs dist/topojson.js -c -m -o dist/topojson.min.js && uglifyjs dist/topojson-server.js -c -m -o dist/topojson-server.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp -v README.md LICENSE dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js ../topojson-bower && cd ../topojson-bower && git add README.md LICENSE topojson.js topojson.min.js && git commit -m "Release $VERSION." && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push && git push --tags && cd ../topojson && cp dist/topojson.js ../d3.github.com/topojson.v2.js && cp dist/topojson.min.js ../d3.github.com/topojson.v2.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add topojson.v2.js topojson.v2.min.js && git commit -m "topojson ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/topojson.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js dist/topojson-server.js dist/topojson-server.min.js
